action.description:
Current stack action in which this deployment resource is being
triggered.

output_values.description:
Map of output values for the deployment, as signaled from the
server.

config_id.description:
ID of the software configuration resource to run when applying to
the server. This ID might not be the same configuration ID with
which the deployment was created because ephemeral configurations
are created throughout the life cycle of the deployment.

status.description:
Current status of the deployment. Value is ``IN_PROGRESS`` ,
``COMPLETE`` , or ``FAILED`` .

status_reason.description:
Error description for the last status change, which is ``FAILED``
status.
